title: Satan Is The New Cupid: A Single's Guide To Halloween Romance
description: Halloween; the day the Dying God passes and the year’s end comes. A day that begins the dark reign over Earth. The sun sets past the gates of Hell, opening them. For the creatures of the underworld, and the souls awaiting to re-enter the world, it’s a day of celebration. They are allowed to walk freely on the Earth, still hidden by the veil that separates them from the physical realm.They all have plans, do you?This books compiles traditional Halloween love spells and rituals along with experimental occultism, chaos magick, and science.If you can't find love with this book, you might not be lovable.
author: Christy Leigh Stewart
